Name: Lunatia Covenant -Pale White Agent-
About the game: *Notice All characters in this game are over 18 years old. * Story Sister Elysia, the agent of the church who made a holy vow to the goddess, came to the forest where the orcs live to investigate an incident. Unknown dangers are waiting for her there, and it seems that the demon, the natural enemy of the priests, is behind this. * Control WSAD/Arrow Keys Move J Confirm/Jump K Cancel/Run U Attack I Dodge O Defend Y Use Skill Esc Menu ※You may customize the key config in menu.. ※Read command list to know how to use more skill. *Content Belt Scrolling ACT Elysia uses swordsmanship and skills to fight enemies and fulfill holy covenants. There are about 40 erotic scenes in total. Even with the same enemy, the erotic scene changes depending on the conditions of occurrence. Basic CG 40+(Partly Animated) There is a「Manual.pdf」in the game folder. You could read it first if you have any questions.
